mapper.select:
select * from sal_chance
where chc_cust_name like concat('%',#{chcCustName},'%')
and chc_title like concat('%',#{chcTitle},'%')
and chc_linkman like concat('%',#{chcLinkman},'%')
order by chc_id desc
